attributes.action: encourage growth of the wood import business from 1000s of miles away
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Can the Prime Minister, central government, regional government and local government please do everything in their power to encourage the destruction of forests around the world so wood can be imported to the UK to feed the growing biomass power station market so i can continue to live the life I lead. Thank you.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
